name: Multibrand 1.0.3 Free token kit
description:
EN

Free Ui kit running the Figma Tokens plugin, suitable for products with multiple brands.

  • Color tokens in the HSL + auto saturation balance scheme
  • Anatomy tokens
  • Connecting any number of brands
  • Dark and light modifications for each brand
  • Identical component architecture
  • Description of managing complex components for designers


üí° Presentation on Behance
